pr_title: Fixed kafka itests as @Inject is not supported in native tests

timeline.message: Fixed kafka itests as @Inject is not supported in native tests

timeline.bodyText: Note that this line would have been invoked in native mode only due to distinct class loaders. But then @Inject is not authorized.
timeline.author: aldettinger

replies.bodyText: is that something documented on quarkus side or a bug ?
replies.author: lburgazzoli

replies.bodyText: Honestly, I don't know but I could take a look.
replies.author: aldettinger

replies.bodyText: yes please as this was working before and it has been used to avoid having warnings at the end of the tests
replies.author: lburgazzoli

replies.bodyText:
It was a change introduced in 1.3.0.CR1. See quarkusio/quarkus@2cea862.
I had to make a similar change for the Infinispan tests.
replies.author: jamesnetherton

replies.bodyText: it looks strange as the pr is about the @Inject annotation
replies.author: lburgazzoli
aldettinger

replies.bodyText: oh now I realized what the issue, sorry for taking so much time. so this change is ok, there may ne something similar elsewhere
replies.author: lburgazzoli

replies.bodyText: For the record, question on quarkus side. ok, I'm gonna check if I can find similar thing elsewhere in the context of another ticket.
replies.author: aldettinger
